nodes.post_title: Preserving Virtual Worlds Hits the Airwaves Again

pageContext.html: Following Matthew Kirschenbaum's appearance on the Kojo Nnamdi show last month, Rachel Donahue and Kari Kraus discuss the Preserving Virtual Worlds project on today's Maryland Morning show with Sheilah Kast on Baltimore's WYPR 88.1 FM (their segment starts about 11 minutes in).
